name: I'm Hiro - Clicker
description:
A clicker game where you have a limited amount of time to reach the boss and defeat it before it's to late. Hiro has the ability to go back in time, that way he is in a loop until he can defeat Lamlich, the final boss (New Sprite at Stage 100)

Upgrade your skills, damage and your companion's attributes to personalize your run.

Unfinished product. Later i'll leave an unmodified Android version here but I don't believe i'll update the game.

Credits:
Lead Programmers: GravityI (Ícaro Peixoto), CaptainDaws (Miguel Almeida)

ZebraAtomica: Game Designer, Main Characters (Hiro and Emma) and "Fighting Part" background Pixel art,  Programming. 

João Ferreira: Character Animations and weapon.

Nayara Del Rio: Upgrade Background, Monsters Pixel Art

Wesley Laurindo: UI Button

Musics by: Emily - Roll for fantasy
SFX by: Freesound
